purpose: Provide high-quality resources and applications for utilizing large language models and vector databases effectively
principle: Combines LLM capabilities with vector database technology to enhance information retrieval and application development
reusability: Offers modular examples and recipes that can be adapted for various use cases involving LLMs and vector databases
limitations: Primarily focused on educational and experimental use, may require customization for specific production environments
name: vectordb-recipes
description: High quality resources & applications for LLMs, multi-modal models and VectorDBs
highlight: Comprehensive resource hub for leveraging LLMs and VectorDBs in diverse applications
